means: 透特（埃及神话中的月神）

sentence.Network_en: Her cry answered by Thoth, the god of learning and magic.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的哭求得到了智慧和魔力之神透特的回应.

sentence.Network_en: Thoth is said to create himself through the power of language.
sentence.Network_cn: 据说索思通过语言的力量缔造了自己.

sentence.Network_en: Thoth, with his wisdom and special powers, healed the eye of Horus.
sentence.Network_cn: 透特凭借自己的智慧和魔力治愈了和鲁斯的眼疾.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 迪可迪奥　dick dlorsthoth索思序言

means.word_mean: 1. Egyptian ibis-headed moon deity; god of wisdom and learning and the arts; scribe of the gods

auth_sentence.content: The doctor may have proclaimed that he was Thoth, the god of magical knowledge who healed the wounded eye of the god Horus.
auth_sentence.res_content: The doctor may have proclaimed that he was Thoth, the god of magical knowledge who healed the wounded eye of the god Horus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The doctor may have proclaimed that he was Thoth, the god of magical knowledge who healed the wounded eye of the god Horus.

auth_sentence.content: There's a story told by Socrates, about the invention of writing in Egypt it was Thoth who invented letters, I think.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's a story told by Socrates, about the invention of writing in Egypt it was Thoth who invented letters, I think.
